commandlist:
`<+><search> query` - search using keywords
`<+><version>` - version preferences and information
`<+><random>` - get a random Bible verse
`<+><verseoftheday>` (`<+><votd>`) - daily verses and automation
`<+><formatting>` - formatting preferences for verse styles
`<+><language>` - language preferences and information
`<+><stats>` - view bot statistics
`<+><invite>` - get the invite link for BibleBot
`<+><supporters>` - the supporters of BibleBot

`<+><creeds>` - ecumenical creeds
`<+><resources>` - various Christian resources (catechisms, confessions, etc.)
usage: To use the bot, just say a Bible verse. I'll handle the rest.
creeds_text: These are the creeds available in BibleBot:
resources_text: These are the resources available in BibleBot:
versionused: Your preferred version is set to <version>.
guildversionused: The server's preferred version is set to <version>.
setserverversionusage: set the server's default version (staff only)
setserverlanguageusage: set the server's default language (staff only)
guildprefixused: The server's command prefix is set to <prefix>.
guildbracketsused: The server's ignoring brackets are set to <brackets>.
versenumbers: Verse numbers are <status>. Use `<+><formatting> <setnumbers>` to change it.
headings: You have headings <status>. Use `<+><formatting> <setheadings>` to change it.
formatting: Your formatting is set to `<value>`. Use `<+><formatting> <set>` to change it.
formattingfail: Use `<+><formatting> <set>` with one of the following parameters: `default, embed, blockquote, code`
otnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Old Testament.
ntnotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the New Testament.
deunotsupported: The version <version> doesn't support the Apocrypha/Deuterocanon.
otnotsupported2: If you want to use the Old Testament, `<+><version> <set>` to a version that has it.
ntnotsupported2: If you want to use the New Testament, `<+><version> <set>` to a version that has it.
deunotsupported2: If you want to use the Apocrypha/Deuterocanon, `<+><version> <set>` to a version that has it.
setguildbracketsnoperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to modify this setting.
setguildversionfail: Failed to set guild version, see `<+><version> <list>`.
setguildlanguagefail: Failed to set server language, see `<+><language> <list>`.
guildlanguageused: This server's preferred language is Replace_With_Language_Name.
guildbracketsfail: Failed to set ignoring brackets, the supported options are `<>`, `[]`, `()`, `{}`.
setvotdtimefail: Failed to set the automatic daily verse, an invalid input was given.
votdtimeused:
The daily verse will be sent at `<time>` and will be published in `<channel>`.
It will use <version>.
novotdtimeused: The automatic daily verse has not been set for this server.
clearvotdtimesuccess: The automatic daily verse successfully cleared.
votdcantprocess: The daily verse can't be processed, see <https://www.biblegateway.com/>.
versioninfo:
**<versionname>**

Contains Old Testament: <hasOT>
Contains New Testament: <hasNT>
Contains Apocrypha/Deuterocanon: <hasDEU>
versioninfofailed: I couldn't find that version, are you sure you used the right acronym?
queryTooShort: Your search query must be longer than 3 characters.
searchNotSupported: +<search> only supports BibleGateway versions at this time.
supporters: A special thank you to the following contributors:
author: by <author>
